items.title: The Complete Android Kotlin Development Masterclass: 4-in-1
items.headline: Apply Kotlin's next-gen concepts for Android applications to make your Android development consistent, faster, and much
objectives_summary: Explore the different parameters and functions in Kotlin and know how to mimic the concept of static in Kotlin using companion objects along with Object-Oriented Kotlin programming
Learn how Kotlin tackles many of the drawbacks of Java such as verbosity and null safety
Implement Lambdas and higher-order functions in Kotlin

items.title: Creating Windows Apps with Visual Studio 2013

items.title: Android Development Using C# and Visual Studio 2012
